description: The Ben-my-Chree will resume sailings earlier than expected after a damaged propeller is repaired.
title: Ben-my-Chree to resume services after propeller repaired
title_page: Ben-my-Chree to resume services after propeller repaired - BBC News
maintext: The vessel was taken to a dry dock in Falmouth on 1 September and returned to the island's waters early on Sunday following tests on its propeller and steering system.
